name: Unicycle Scientist: Saves the World
description:
The amazing Unicycle Scientist has created the cure to literally every single problem in the world. But the evil super villain Pentagon Man does not want to see the world become a better place, and so he tries to stop Unicycle Scientist by blowing up their laboratory. Now it is up to the greatest scientist in the world to make it out of the collapsing building and save the cure.

Controls:

[A] and [D] or left and right arrow keys to play.

Credits:

MrWhimble (Lewis) : Programming

Kitiliisu : Art

Sounds:

Level song: https://opengameart.org/content/die-hard-battle 

Explosion: https://opengameart.org/content/dynamite-sound-effect 

Menu Music: https://opengameart.org/content/menu-1 ( License: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ )

Intro Music: https://opengameart.org/content/you-cant-beat-the-machine 

Win Sound: https://opengameart.org/content/win-sound-effect
